thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 4 of 48
thread.title: Cashell,Mr Maurice

author: Cashell,Mr Maurice
title: Cashell,Mr Maurice
text:
From my decision to switch I've had few calls to make. Those that I have made have been dealt with quickly, clearly.
It's not brain surgery! But where Energia scores is in keeping it simple.
I'll give them an extra star if, when my contract expires, they notify me so that I can engage with them on the terms of my new contract. Lesser companies remain silent, and we overlook that we've slid back to standard terms.
